full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE LDAN BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I SMON LAM LEGS TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MIR GENG WANG SHOG CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU SNA TSOGS RDO RJES DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BRDAGS BCAS NAN GTAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DGE SBYONGS BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO GNAS MCHOG RI BO DVANGS BSIL GYI NYE 'DSABS PHU SA TING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAM,, ,,)
